statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.ChannelID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
, CC.Name as ChannelName
FROM dbo.TCustomerChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TCustomerChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCustomerChannel ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, CustomerID, ChannelID, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #CustomerID#, #ChannelID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCustomerChannel SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , ChannelID = #ChannelID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
